Where this becomes a problem is when obesity obsession becomes a barrier to accessing health care: Â I'm a fat middle-aged female patient recently diagnosed with asthma after changing to a primary care doctor who was willing to listen to a frustrating history of allergies and Breathlessness on exertion instead of taking a look at me and telling me, "You need to lose weight, you should diet and exercise more" like the last few providers I'd seen (I've also had a long history of intermittent insurance coverage with big gaps; finally got that Resolved, too.)
Proper treatment is a wonderful thing; wish more people could get it.Â
